attributes.action: Uphold the law which prohibits any government from passing laws which will tie the hands of any new incoming administration.  That such steps cannot lawfully take place without the electorate being given a referendum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since the signing of Magna Carta it has always been the tradition of the United Kingdom that we be governed under Democratic rule. With our Monarch as its formal Head of State.

No government of whatever persuasion shall have the right to introduce any legislation either by stealth,ignorance or subterfuge which alters this tradition, without the express permission of its electorate. Should any attempt at such changes be made, Parliament must always first seek approval by the electorate via a referendum if no Democratic Election be pending.

This petition also requests that all potential members of Parliament agree to uphold these traditions before putting themselves forward for election.

Any member of Parliament who fails to honour this undertaking must resign their seat immediately and forfeit any severance/retirement benefits

God save our Queen!
